EnvDeclaration.description: An env declaration is a string that references an environment variable.
EnvDeclaration.title: EnvDeclaration

LambdaDeclaration.description: A lambda declaration is a python expression that can be evaluated within a context.
LambdaDeclaration.title: LambdaDeclaration

LinkDeclaration.description: An link declaration is a string that references another action's output
LinkDeclaration.title: LinkDeclaration

PromptContextInConfigLambda.description: A lambda declaration for prompt context in config.
PromptContextInConfigLambda.title: PromptContextInConfigLambda

PromptContextInConfigLink.description: An input declaration for prompt context in config.
PromptContextInConfigLink.title: PromptContextInConfigLink

PromptContextInConfigTemplate.description: A template string for prompt context in config.
PromptContextInConfigTemplate.title: PromptContextInConfigTemplate

PromptContextInConfigVar.description: A variable declaration for prompt context in config.
PromptContextInConfigVar.title: PromptContextInConfigVar

TextDeclaration.description: A template declaration is a string that can be rendered within a context.
TextDeclaration.title: TextDeclaration

VarDeclaration.description: A variable declaration is a string that references a variable (or path to nested variable) in the context.
VarDeclaration.title: VarDeclaration
